reviewText: Dr. Wilkinson uses the first two chapters of the Book of Nehemiah to illustrate the process of leadership, its stumbling blocks and tests, and how to accomplish the vision God has put in your heart, and not "wander and squander your life".A brilliant speaker who bases his teachings on sound Biblical principles, there is a lot to be gained from this series of "Sessions", whether you are a business person, a church leader, or self-employed; as a free-lance artist, I obtained a lot of insight from the sage advice in these lessons, which show how to deal with doubt, be aware of your hidden motives, survive rejection, and do "something significant for Him".At the beginning of each segment, Dr. Wilkinson interviews people in all walks of life who have achieved their goals with integrity and passion, along with the peace only the Lord can give when working for His purpose.There are 8 half-hour sessions in this set, ideal for a group study for a small business or church, or any individual wishing to fulfill their destiny, and do it in accordance with God's plan for their life.The topic headers are "The Birth of the Vision", "The Power of the Vision", "The Validation of the Vision", and "The Tests of the Vision", with each topic having 2 sessions apiece. A word of caution: there are gaps between the sessions, so don't  stop the tape thinking "it's over" before its time.

reviewText: This great DVD explores John 15 the vine and the branch parable. It shows the walk of a believer and the steps we enter into with this life in Christ. Bruce does a wonderful job with great visuals about vineyard caring and why pruning and other activities that seem destructive are so important for true growth. I loved this DVD and the message of steps of growth and the importance of abiding in Christ. Because of the great props used in this DVD you see what Jesus was actually describing and the nueances of a vineyard are explored. This is a great exploration into the importance abiding in the word and in The Father to bear much fruit for the Kingdom. By abiding in Christ this bearing fruit is not works of the flesh but of the True Life of Christ flowing into us and then through us. You cant go wrong getting this DVD. Be blessed JB
summary: ABIDING IN CHRIST AND BEARING MUCH FRUIT

reviewText: This is about the third or fourth video series I have watched by Bruce Wilkinson.  The content of Secrets of the Vine is excellent, just like his other series.The content is as follows:1.  Help us discover what we were born for - a life of abundant impact and significance for God.2.  Discover what God desires for you and how He works in your life to help you bear fruit for Him.3.  Discover the secrets in how God brings you from unfruitfulness to fruit-bearing.4.  The various stages that God brings each of us through to bring us to fruitfulness.5.  Find out how God brings us to more fruit.6.  Learn more about how God works in your life and what He wants for you.7.  Desiring a deeper relationship with God that will make us a blessing to those around you.8.  Discover how to come to joyful abundance in your life.One of the points made that most affected was the reminder that instead of working more for Christ, we need to abide (spend more time) with Christ.  When we abide, then we will experience more of His power in our lives and produce more fruit for His glory.  In today's fast-paced lifestyle, I needed to hear this point again to remind me that apart from Jesus Christ, I am utterly helpless and hopeless without Him.  With Him, I have all I will ever need!Highly recommended.  Watch, enjoy, and be challenged!
summary: Excellent Series on How to Be More Fruitful for God
Title: N/A

reviewText: Bruce Wilkinson has incredible insight into the mind and heart of God. He is also excellent in presenting practical applications of ancient texts. In this eight-session program you learn how to take risks, avoid vision "slayers" and reprioritize in order to accomplish your goals. While he is talking your vision may become very apparent. There are also amazing stories of how people turned their vision into a reality. Some of the questions Bruce Wilkinson answers include:How do you know if your vision is from God?How do successful people handle fear?Is your vision based on someone else's needs?How will you be tested before your vision becomes a reality?This DVD set is excellent for anyone who wants to learn how to lead with a powerful mission statement. If you want to know how you can achieve success in business or your personal life then this has many answers to how you can move beyond what you believe you can't do to a place of accomplishment.~The Rebecca Review
